thread.title: Nicole Autumn

author: Nicole Autumn
title: Nicole Autumn
text: I love that there is a company I can trust for quality products that some companies are not educated about. I use The magnolia bark powder for my high energy Pharaoh Hound at night - Just the orange scoop in her dinner and it is wonderfully calming for her nervous system- Me the phenibut and also use the inositol. Hmmm. both of us have sensitive nervous systems!
